options.name: Barbarian Armor
options.description: You cannot wear Medium or Heavy Armor. Gain +1 Damage to Melee Attacks and +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Path of the Barbarian
options.description: Become Good at Strength or Resilience

options.name: Reaction : Primal Fury
options.description: When you are the Target of a True Hit, downgrade it to a normal hit but gain the Maddened Condition until the end of your next turn. This Condition cannot be nullified by Spells or Traits that cause Immunity to the Maddened Condition.

options.name: Reaction : Retaliate
options.description: After taking Damage by a Creature within your Melee Range, you can make a Melee Attack as a Reaction.

options.name: Action : In the Thick
options.description: You gain a bonus equal to your Resilience Modifier to all Mitigations and a 1d4 Bonus to your Melee Attacks until the end of your next turn.
